name: Fly Academy Lognes
about: Fly Academy Lognes is a premier flight training institution dedicated to producing highly skilled and safety-conscious pilots. With a strong emphasis on innovative training methods and a commitment to individualized instruction, we cater to students from diverse backgrounds. Our experienced instructors, many of whom are former airline pilots, provide comprehensive training under both FAA and EASA regulations. Located in a dynamic aviation environment, our academy offers state-of-the-art facilities, including advanced simulators and a modern fleet of aircraft. We pride ourselves on fostering a supportive learning environment and maintaining strong industry connections to ensure our graduates have seamless pathways to careers with major airlines. At Fly Academy Lognes, we are dedicated to helping you achieve your aviation dreams with excellence and professionalism.
services:
["Private Pilot License (PPL)
Light Aircraft Pilot License LAPL (A)
Retractable landing gear and variable pitch variant (VP/RU)
Night flight qualification
Accompanying training"]
